title: MCP Server Performance Testing Plan
description: Comprehensive task list for testing and validating TappMCP server performance

project.name: TappMCP Server Performance Testing
project.description: Quality assurance testing plan for deployed TappMCP server to validate HTML generation, thought process API, and overall performance

phases.name: Phase 1: Server Health Validation
phases.description: Validate basic server health, connectivity, and operational status

tasks.title: Test Health Endpoint
tasks.description: Validate /health endpoint returns 200 OK with server metrics

tasks.title: Test Readiness Endpoint
tasks.description: Validate /ready endpoint confirms server is ready for requests

tasks.title: Validate Container Health
tasks.description: Check Docker container health status and resource usage

tasks.title: Analyze Memory Usage
tasks.description: Monitor memory consumption and identify potential leaks

phases.name: Phase 2: MCP Tool Functionality Testing
phases.description: Test core MCP tools including smart_begin, smart_write, and thought process API

tasks.title: Test MCP Initialization
tasks.description: Validate MCP server properly initializes and responds to client requests

tasks.title: Test Smart Begin Tool
tasks.description: Validate smart_begin tool creates project structure and quality gates

tasks.title: Test HTML Generation via Smart Write
tasks.description: Test smart_write tool generates HTML with header, footer, and required content

tasks.title: Test Thought Process API
tasks.description: Validate thought process API returns AI reasoning and decision-making steps

phases.name: Phase 3: Code Quality Analysis
phases.description: Analyze generated code quality, structure, and compliance with standards

tasks.title: Analyze HTML Structure
tasks.description: Validate generated HTML has proper DOCTYPE, head, body, header, footer elements

tasks.title: Assess CSS Quality
tasks.description: Evaluate CSS styling, responsiveness, and best practices implementation

tasks.title: Check Accessibility Compliance
tasks.description: Validate HTML meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards

tasks.title: Validate Code Standards
tasks.description: Check generated code follows project coding standards and best practices

phases.name: Phase 4: Performance Benchmarking
phases.description: Measure and analyze server performance metrics and response times

tasks.title: Measure Response Times
tasks.description: Benchmark response times for all MCP tool calls and endpoints

tasks.title: Test Throughput Capacity
tasks.description: Measure concurrent request handling and system throughput

tasks.title: Analyze Resource Utilization
tasks.description: Monitor CPU, memory, and network usage during operations

phases.name: Phase 5: Report Generation
phases.description: Generate comprehensive performance report with findings and recommendations

tasks.title: Compile Performance Metrics
tasks.description: Aggregate all performance data into comprehensive metrics dashboard

tasks.title: Generate HTML Performance Report
tasks.description: Create clean, focused HTML report showing MCP server performance only

tasks.title: Document Recommendations
tasks.description: Provide actionable recommendations for server improvements
